lines.text: Looks like we've got a mexican standoff.
Brilliant plan, Colonel. Slaughter your own men, hand over more weapons to the convicts, maybe kill a few hostages along the way! What's your next masterplan? Nuke the town?
You're the one on the squad radio? Who the hell do you think you are, mister?
I'm a guy with a wife back in that town, you dumb son of a bitch!
Save your breath, he can't hear you. Assholes don't have ears.
Ya know, you two have a serious attitude problem!
Now I'm just gonna ask you one more time. Where did he take the hostages?
Why don't you eat shit and die?
That was rude, Smitty! Don't you think, Billy?
You know how to use that thing?
My mother was fullblooded Cherokee, it's in the genes.
I'll blow her brains to Kingdom Come!
